Author: A Good Product...Always!
Review Rating: Reviewed in the United States on October 26
Review Text: Miracle Gro has always been my go-to for houseplant or Annual flower fertilizer.  It is also very superior for vegetable gardening and lawns!  I was totally impressed with the Single Packets!  They are time-saving and VERY fast & easy to use.  (And I no longer have to lug the container around with me to do my fertilizing.  These Singles fit in my pocket
column6: which is so handy!!)  Thanks

Review Text: My first time to use the miracle gro singles!  They are great!  No waste and I like being able to fertilize my plants individually!

Author: Super easy to use!
Review Rating: Reviewed in the United States on August 23
Review Text: I’m terrible at plants.  I’ve been trying for years to keep my outdoor pots looking nice but never have success.  I know I need to give them plant food
column6: but was never sure about what kind
column8: etc.  These singles are perfect.  They are so easy to use.  Just dump 1-2 in my watering can and go.  I’ve being using it 1-2 times a month and have been very pleased with the results.  My plants are so nice that the deer keep coming back to eat them.  So at least you know they were flowing
column10: and delicious!  But at least they have looked better this year than before.  Will definitely purchase again.

Review Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars
